content.text:
# Waru language

Waru is an Austronesian language of Southeast Sulawesi, Indonesia.
References
Further reading
*Mead, David. 1998. Proto-Bungku-Tolaki: Reconstruction of its phonology and aspects of its morphosyntax. PhD dissertation. Houston: Rice University.
*Mead, David. 1999. The Bungkuâ€“Tolaki languages of south-eastern Sulawesi, Indonesia. Series D-91. Canberra: Pacific Linguistics.
